author: chfast
content: EOF doesn't need/have jumpdest analysis so it can be bigger if the analysis is the only problem.

author: zerosnacks
content: Considering there still is an upper bound based on the bit size constraints in the header the maximum contract size would be 64KB (0xFFFF), (outside of any other considerations) correct?

author: chfast
content: No. Only a single section is limited to 0xffff. But you can have single data section + multiple functions (separate sections) + multiple subcontainers.
